Articles.Content:
I'm not really new to the game (since .20) or the forums, however, I don't feel as though I've been as helpful or productive as I could be. I spend a lot of time reading through the threads, but I never contribute to them. Any tips I should know?

Thanks,

Loligoat

Welcome (back) to the forums!

If you're feeling like sharing your wisdom with the next generation of KSP users, feel free to take a look at some of the unanswered threads in the Gameplay Questions section and sharing anything you think might be helpful. (It's also perfectly fine to ask questions if you're still stuck on a particular mission or goal yourself, of course.)
Hello Loligoat, and welcome to the forum.
Thanks for the replies, guys. I look forward to joining you guys!
